about-us-text: ZweiM Bau GmbH undertakes all exterior and interior construction work professionally and reliably. We guarantee high quality of execution and strict adherence to deadlines. Our specialties include drywall construction, ceiling construction, spatula work and painting. We are also specialized With numerous qualified employees, the company can respond to the wishes of the customers. In addition, you are able to do the work throughout Switzerland and thus find the best solution for every customer. The focus is on working closely with customers and discussing and solving problems on site.
quote: We are able to meet even the most demanding orders. Trust the professionals and use our services
service-1-4: Ceiling cladding made of mineral fiber boards
service-3-2: Floor and wall coverings of all kinds
